16295.「いつの間に入れ替わったのかは わからぬが\n 先刻 ガズバランの牙から わし宛:
I do not know when they were replaced, but I
received a letter from Gazbalan's Fang
addressed to me the other day.

16296.「書状の内容は 以下のようなものでした。\n ……ガートラント王族 ゼラリム姫の:
The contents of the letter were as follows ...We, the Gazbalan's Fang, have taken custody of Princess Zelarim of the royal family of
Gartlant.

16297.「姫の命が惜しくば 捕らえられている\n 牙のメンバーを 全員 解放したのち\n:
If the life of the princess is spared, the present King Grossner must abdicate after releasing all the captured members of the
Fang!

16298.「……聞いてのとおりだ。\n 一国の王として このような脅迫に\n 屈するわけに:
As you have heard. As the king of a kingdom, I
cannot give in to such threats.

16299.「だが ゼラリムは わしにとって\n ただひとりの肉親。あの子が 今どうしている:
But Zelalim is my only living relative. Just
thinking about how she is doing now makes my
heart burst.

16300.「今すぐ 兵を率い 姫を救いだしたいところだが\n そんなことをすれば ヤツらに:
I'd like to lead my men and save the princess right now, but if I do that, they'll know we're on to them and I'll be putting her life
in danger for nothing. But...

16301.「そこでじゃ！ 今回は お前さんに\n ゼラリム姫の救出を 頼みたい。\n ……:
So! This time, I'd like to ask you to rescue
Princess Zelarim. In secret, of course.

16302.「失敗の許されない 重大な使命じゃ。\n 引き受けてくれるか <pc>？:
This is a mission too important to fail. Will
you accept the mission?

16303.「よく言ってくれた <pc>！\n お前さんならば きっと 無事に\n 姫を救い:
Well said, <pc>! I have no doubt that
you will rescue the princess safely.

16304.「問題は 兵を使って 捜索させるわけにも\n いかないため 姫が どこに囚われて:
The problem is that we don't know where the
princess is being held, because we can't have
soldiers searching for her.

16305.「そうじゃな。ガズバランの剣に\n くわしい者ならば 何か知っているかもしれん。:
Yes, that's right. Someone who is familiar
with the sword of Gazbalan might know
something about it. First, find such a person.

16306.「おお 引き受けてくれるか！\n ……だが お前さん どうやら 多くの\n 頼ま:
Oh, you'll take care of it! But you seem to be
taking on a lot of requests.

16307.「ゼラリム姫の命が かかっておる以上\n そんな いいかげんなことでは困る。\n:
Princess Zelarim's life is at stake, so we
can't afford to be so careless. Now go and
clean it up!

16308.「ここで 断るとか ありえんじゃろう！\n しっかりしろ <pc>よ！:
You can't refuse me here! Get a grip,
<pc>!

16309.「まさか この場所が 見つかるとは\n 思いませんでしたよ。\n なかなか 優秀:
I didn't expect to find this place. That's
quite excellent <cs_pchero>.

16310.「あなたの目的は わかってますよ。\n この人形…… 本物のゼラリム姫を\n 助:
I know what you're here for. This doll... is
here to rescue the real Princess Zelarim,
isn't she?

16311.「……ですが 真正面から 乗り込んでくるのは\n いただけませんね。\n こうな:
But it's not right to come in head-on. You
didn't think this would happen, did you?

16313.「帰って グロスナー王に伝えなさい。\n 姑息なマネなどしないで いさぎよく\n:
Go home and tell King Grossner. Tell him to
leave the throne with dignity, and not to play
any tricks!

16315.「……フウ フウ。\n ガートラント兵士団 支給品の閃光玉は\n なかなかの威力:
...hmmm...hmmm. Gartlant Soldiers' Corps. The
flashbulbs they give you are quite powerful,
aren't they?

16316.「謹慎中の身だが どうにも\n じっとしていられなくてね。\n 気がついたら こ:
I'm under house arrest, but I just can't sit
still. I found myself here.

16317.「さあ 姫は 救いだした！\n あとは 王家にたてつく 不届き者どもを\n 退治:
Now, the princess is rescued! Now all we have
to do is exterminate the infidels who stand in
the way of the royal family.

16318.「き 貴様は スピンドル！\n ……そうか。このアジトの場所は\n お前が 教え:
You're Spindle! I see. So you're the one who
told them where this hideout is?

16319.「ガズバランの剣では 新米だった貴様が…… \n よくよく 私の邪魔をしてくれる:
How dare you, a newcomer by the sword of
Gazbalan, stand in my way.

16320.「やはり それを知っているのか。\n どこか見覚えのある その容姿……\n キミ:
You know it after all. That somewhat familiar
look... you're related to Captain Zexen,
aren't you?

16321.「血縁だと？ 私は 天涯孤独の身。\n 子を持った覚えはないし 兄弟もおらぬ。\:
Blood? I've been a loner my whole life. I have
no children, no siblings.
Kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk...

16322.「ここまで言っても わからぬか スピンドル？\n 私に言わせれば 見る影もなく:
Don't you see what I'm getting at here, Spindle? If you ask me, you look like a different person now that you've grown fat and
squat without a trace of your former self.

16323.「バ バカな！？\n お前が ゼクセン兵士長のはずない！\n あの人は 私より:
Ba, you idiot! You can't be Captain Zexen!
That person is at least 10 years older than
me!

16324.「クックック……。王国を追放された後も\n 私は ひたすらに 自身を きたえつづ:
Even after I was banished from the kingdom, I
continued to strengthen myself. Believing that
strength is the value of Ogre.

16325.「だが いくら きたえあげようとも\n 肉体は 時とともに 老いおとろえていく。:
But no matter how hard we try to strengthen
our bodies, they grow old and frail with time.

16326.「自らの おとろえに気づいた私は 絶望した。\n このまま 年老いて 世間を見返:
When I realized my own decrepitude, I despaired. I thought I would continue to grow old and die quietly, unable to look back on
the world...

16327.「そこに現れたのが このピュージュだ！\n 彼のおかげで 私は 若き肉体と\n:
Then along came this Pyuju! Thanks to him I
received a younger body and even more
strength.

16328.「……そう。人を超える存在としての強さをな。: Yes. The strength to be more than a person.

16329.「はいは～い。\n それじゃあ いってみよ～か♪: Yes~. Well then, let's try it~!

16330.「見よ この無敵の肉体をっ！\n このチカラがあれば 人質などなくとも\n 我が:
Behold my invincible body! With this power, my
revenge will be accomplished without hostages.

16331.「ガズバランの剣を 解散に追い込み\n 私を追放した グロスナーに……\n ガー:
I will make Grossner, who drove the sword of
Gazbalan to its dissolution and exiled me, and
I will make Gartlant pay for it!

16332.「<cs_pchero>！\n 私は 姫様の御身を 守らねばならぬ。\n この戦:
<cs_pchero>! I must protect the princess. I
leave this battle to you!

16333.「フウ フウ…… <cs_pchero>。\n わ 私は 姫様を守らねば……なら:
Fuu fuu... <cs_pchero>. I must protect the
princess. The rest... will be left to me...

16334.「何度 来ようとも 結果は同じ。\n 人を超える存在となった私に\n 人たる身で:
No matter how many times I come back, the
result will be the same. I have become more
than a person, and I am no more than a person.

16335.「このチカラがあれば グロスナーに……\n ガートラントに 思い知らせてやれる。:
With this power, I can make Grossner and
Gartlant pay for what they have done to me.
Now is the time for revenge!

16336.「グォォ……お おのれぇ……。\n 人を超えた存在である私が\n や 敗れるはず:
I, who am beyond person, should not have been
defeated...

16337.「ピュージュっ！！\n もっと……チカラをくれ！ もっとだ！: Pyuju! Give me more... power! More!

16338.「私は……誰よりも 強くあって\n ガズバランの剣の思想が 正しいことを\n 証:
I must be stronger than anyone else to prove
that Gazbalan's idea of the sword is correct!

16340.「ガズバランの剣が 目指していたものは\n そんな 魔物のチカラに頼った\n ま:
What the sword of Gazbalan was aiming for was
not the strength of an imitation relying on
the power of a monster!

16341.「私は……今の地位に あぐらをかいて\n 修練をおこたり かつてのチカラを失いま:
I... have been sitting on my laurels,
neglecting my training, and losing the power I
once had.

16342.「どうして こうなってしまったんだろうと\n 毎日 そんなことを 考えるばかりで:
Every day I keep thinking about how it all
came to this... It's absolutely pathetic.

16343.「ですが そんな 私でも\n デルタニス王子が 生前 言っておられた\n この教:
But even I have not forgotten what Prince
Deltanis told me before his death!

16344.「ガズバランの剣が目指す 強さとは\n ただ 敵に勝てればいいというものではない:
The strength that the Sword of Gazbalan aims
for is not just to defeat one's enemies. It is
true strength that conquers one's own heart.

16345.「あなたの強さは ガズバランの剣が\n 求めたものではない！ 復讐者が振るう\n:
Your strength is not what the sword of
Gazbalan sought! It is like a poisoned, wet,
deadly blade wielded by an avenger!

16346.「……デルタニスの言葉だ……と？\n ガ ガズバランの剣は…… 私は……。:
...the word of Deltanis...? Gazbalan's
sword... I...

16348.「身体が…… 身体が 燃えるように熱い。: My body... my body is burning hot.

16349.「あ～あ。もう 限界が来ちゃったか♪\n 意外と 早かったね。:
Ah~ ah. I guess I've already reached my
limit... ♪ It was surprisingly quick.

16350.「ゼクセンくんの身体が ボクのあげた魔力に\n 耐えられなくなっちゃったんだよ。:
Zexen-kun's body can no longer withstand the
magic power I gave him. I can't make him
stronger.

16352.「な～に そのウラミがましい目は？\n これまで さんざん 協力してあげたのに\:
What's with the lameness in your eyes? I've
helped you out so much, but if you act like
that, it's going to hurt me~.

16353.「でも まあ いいヒマつぶしには なったよ。\n おかげで ガートラントを混乱さ:
But, well, it was a good way to kill time. And
thanks to you, I was able to fulfill his order
to disrupt Gartlant.

16355.「……ああ <cs_pchero>くん。\n キミのことは よ～く覚えておくよ。:
Oh <cs_pchero>. I'll remember you well.
Let's play again sometime.

16358.「……これが 笑わずにいられようか。\n 魔物のチカラまで……借りて\n 復讐に:
How can I not laugh at this? He even borrowed
the power of a monster... to take revenge...
and now this is what he gets.

16359.「スピンドル <cs_pchero>。\n どうか グロスナー王に……伝えてくれ:
Spindle <cs_pchero>. Please, please tell
King Grossner...tell him.

16360.「私の復讐は 実体のない……ハリボテだったが\n 今のままのガートラントでは い:
My vengeance was insubstantial, a mere euphemism, but in Gartlant as it is now, there will come a time when someone else will follow
in the footsteps of the sword.

16361.「そのこと ゆめゆめ お忘れなきように\n ……と。: I hope you will not forget that.

16364.「<cs_pchero>さまには\n いろいろ ご迷惑をおかけしてしまったようで:
I am so sorry for all the trouble I have
caused <cs_pchero>.

16365.「まさか あのチョコ神ぬいぐるみが\n そのような 恐ろしい企みに\n 利用され:
I had no idea that the Choco-God Plushie was
being used in such a horrible scheme...

16366.「それでは 私は ひと足先に\n 姫を城まで お送りさせていただく。:
I will see the princess off to the castle
before you.

16367.「<cs_pchero>くんも できるだけ早く\n 戻ってくれたまえ。:
And <cs_pchero> get back to me as soon as
you can.

16368.「お前さんの活躍は すでに\n スピンドルから 聞いておるぞ。\n よくやってく:
I've already heard of your exploits from
Spindle. Well done <pc>!

16369.「思えば 一連のガズバランの牙事件では\n 最初から <pc>の世話に\n なり:
Looking back, we have been indebted to
<pc> from the beginning in a series
of Gazbalan's Fang cases.

16370.「感謝の気持ちには とても足りぬが\n せめてもの 礼の品じゃ。受け取ってくれ。:
It's not much to thank you for, but at least
it's a courtesy gift. Please accept it.

16371.「ピュージュを逃がしたのは 残念だが\n 姫は無事に戻り ガズバランの牙は壊滅。:
It's a shame we let Pyuju go, but the princess
is back safe and Gazbalan's Fang is destroyed.
...I couldn't be more pleased.

16372.「グロスナー王！\n どうか 前兵士長ゼクセンの最期の言葉を\n お忘れなきよう:
King Grossner! Please, do not forget the last
words of our former Captain Zexen.

16373.「今のままのガートラントでは いずれまた\n ガズバランの剣の遺志を継ぐ者が 現:
I do not believe that Gartlant, as it is now, will ever again have a successor to carry on the legacy of Gazbalan's sword... I do not
believe that this is just a delusion.

16374.「……そうであったな。ピュージュが言い残した\n あの方とやらの 存在も気になる:
I am not so sure. I am also concerned about
the existence of that person whom Pyuju
mentioned, so I can't be all that happy.

16375.「思えば この国は 平和に慣れきってしまい\n それを ゆるぎないものとするため:
For Peace, we may have become so accustomed to it that we have neglected to make the necessary efforts to make it a lasting
reality.

16376.「この国を 治める者として\n ゼクセンの言葉 しかと 胸に刻んでおこう！:
As the ruler of this country, I will remember
Zexen's words to the very core of my being!
